input:
1. As a deaf user, I want to use my devices camera to sign words, so that the app can convert them into text.
Acceptance Criteria:
 - The app should use the device's camera to recognize sign language gestures in real time.
 - The app should accurately convert the recognized signs into text.
 - The app should allow users to adjust the camera angle for better recognition.

2. As a user, I want to type text into the app, so that it can be converted into sign language using an animated avatar.
Acceptance Criteria:
 - The app should have a text input field where users can type their messages.
 - The app should display an avatar that performs the corresponding sign language gestures for the typed text.
 - The conversion should happen in real time with smooth avatar animations.

3. As a user, I want to be able to switch between different sign languages (e.g., ASL, BSL), so that I can use the app according to my preferred sign language.
Acceptance Criteria:
 - The app should offer a selection of sign languages such as ASL, BSL, or others.
 - The user should be able to select their preferred sign language from a settings menu.
 - The avatar or text recognition should change according to the selected sign language.

4. As a deaf user, I want to save my signed messages as text, so that I can refer to them later.
Acceptance Criteria:
 - The app should provide an option to save the converted text from the sign language.
 - The saved text should be stored in a history section within the app for future reference.

5. As a user, I want to adjust the speed of the avatar's signing, so that I can follow the gestures at my own pace.
Acceptance Criteria:
 - The app should provide a slider or option to adjust the speed of the avatar's sign language gestures.
 - The speed setting should be applied in real time and affect the avatar's signing animation accordingly.

6. As a user, I want to upload a video of someone signing, so that the app can convert it into text for me.
Acceptance Criteria:
 - The app should allow users to upload videos containing sign language gestures.
 - The app should analyze the video and convert the recognized signs into text.
 - The converted text should be displayed on the app with an option to save or share.

7. As a user, I want to be able to share my signed messages and their text conversion with others, so that I can communicate effectively.
Acceptance Criteria:
 - The app should provide sharing options for both the signed video and its text translation.
 - The user should be able to share the messages via social media, messaging apps, or email.

8. As a user, I want the app to display suggestions or corrections if the sign language input is unclear, so that I can improve the accuracy of the conversion.
Acceptance Criteria:
 - The app should notify users when a sign language gesture is not recognized clearly.
 - The app should suggest similar signs or prompt the user to retry signing the word.

9. As a deaf user, I want to be able to use voice-to-sign conversion, so that I can see spoken words translated into sign language in real time.
Acceptance Criteria:
 - The app should provide a voice input option that converts spoken words into sign language gestures by the avatar.
 - The avatar should display the corresponding sign language gestures in real time as the speech is recognized.

10. As a user, I want to receive feedback on my signing accuracy, so that I can improve my sign language skills.
Acceptance Criteria:
 - The app should analyze the users signing accuracy based on predefined sign language rules.
 - The app should provide real-time feedback or a summary of errors and suggestions for improvement.

11. As a parent of a deaf child, I want to use the app to learn sign language through text input and avatar demonstrations, so that I can communicate better with my child.
Acceptance Criteria:
 - The app should have a learning mode where users can input text and see the avatar perform the corresponding signs.
 - The app should provide visual aids and tutorials for learning new signs or phrases.

12. As a user, I want to access a dictionary of common signs, so that I can quickly learn their meanings and how to perform them.
Acceptance Criteria:
 - The app should include a built-in sign language dictionary with videos or avatar demonstrations of each sign.
 - The user should be able to search for signs by word or phrase and see an avatar demonstrate the sign.

13. As a developer, I want the app to be accessible for users with different abilities, so that everyone can use the app comfortably.
Acceptance Criteria:
 - The app should follow accessibility guidelines (e.g., large fonts, color contrast) for users with visual or physical disabilities.
 - The app should provide voice-over support and easy-to-navigate interfaces.

14. As a user, I want to be able to use the app offline, so that I can convert sign language to text or text to sign without an internet connection.
Acceptance Criteria:
 - The app should allow users to perform basic sign-to-text and text-to-sign conversions without internet access.
 - The offline mode should still provide accurate conversions and avatar animations for sign language gestures. Give me a use case diagram for this app.

left to right direction

    usecase "Learn Sign Language" as UC11

    usecase "Use App Offline" as UC14
}

input:
1. As a One Stop Admin, I want to have centralized dashboard for all my tasks so that I can oversee all degree issuance activities and timely complete my responsibilities.
2. As a One Stop Admin, I want to generate tokens for each student request and complaint, so that each query is uniquely identified and efficiently managed.
3. As a One Stop Admin, I want to manage all pending, processed, and new degree and transcript requests, so that I can ensure timely responses and prioritize tasks.
4. As a One Stop Admin, I want to manage student complaints, so that I can respond and resolve them in a timely manner for students.
5. As a One Stop Admin, I want to generate and issue digital degrees to students, so that graduates receive their degrees promptly and statuses are updated.
6. As a One Stop Admin, I want access to all student academic records, so that I can generate degrees and transcripts with correct credentials.
7. As a One Stop Admin, I want to generate and issue student transcripts, so that graduates receive comprehensive academic records.
8. As a One Stop Admin, I want to inform students of objections from FYP or Finance Department, so that they can address issues preventing degree issuance.
9. As a One Stop Admin, I want to verify student information and eligibility for degree issuance, so that degrees are issued accurately to eligible students.
10. As a One Stop Admin, I want to process requests in batches, so that I can efficiently manage peak times such as the end of an academic term.
11. As a One Stop Admin, I want to generate reports and analytics, so that I can identify patterns, monitor system efficiency, and recognize areas for improvement.
12. As a Student, I want to submit my degree issuance form, so that I can formally request the issuance of my degree from the university.
13. As a Student, I want to file a complaint for errors in my documents, so that I can ensure the accuracy of my academic records.
14. As a Student, I want to track the activity of my degree issuance request, so that I can stay informed about its progress.
15. As a Student, I want to receive a notification when my degree is ready for collection or delivery, so that I can obtain it for further academic or professional purposes.
16. As a member of the FYP Department, I want to notify students about the status of their degree issuance requests, so that they can be informed about the progress.
17. As a member of the FYP Department, I want to provide a decision on degree issuance requests, so that the requests can be processed accordingly.
18. As a member of the FYP Department, I want to track the time taken to process degree issuance requests, so that we can monitor and improve our efficiency.
19. As a member of the FYP Department, I want to review all details provided by students in their degree issuance requests, so that I can make informed decisions.
20. As a member of the FYP Department, I want to collaborate with the Finance Department regarding financial aspects of degree issuance, so that I can ensure all financial requirements are met.
21. As a Finance Accountant, I want to access notifications for student degree issuance requests, so that I can verify their credentials and respond accordingly.
22. As a Finance Accountant, I want to search for a students financial records by roll number, so that I can look up outstanding dues.
23. As a Finance Accountant, I want to check if a student has submitted the degree issuance fee, so that I can ensure eligibility for degree collection.
24. As a Finance Accountant, I want to add comments regarding a students eligibility for degree collection, so that the student is informed about clearance issues.
25. As a Finance Accountant, I want to update the students status to eligible after dues are cleared, so that degrees are issued without delay.
26. As a Campus Director, I want to view all requests generated throughout the day, so that I can monitor the internal operations of the One Stop system.
27. As a Campus Director, I want to view all requests made directly to me, so that I can respond quickly and pass orders accordingly.
28. As a Campus Director, I want to view the Time Taken to Respond (TTR) metrics for each request, so that I can identify system weaknesses and ensure prompt query handling.
29. As a Campus Director, I want to get notified for the initiation of request processing by the One Stop Admin, so that I can stay informed about the progress.
30. As a Campus Director, I want to review fee clearance requests sent to students, so that I can ensure timely updates and smooth financial processing.
 Design a use case diagram for the above user stories.

input:
1. As a user, I want to search for products by category, brand, and price range, so that I can find the items I need.
Acceptance Criteria:
 - The app should allow users to search for products by category, brand, and price range.
 - The user should be able to filter search results based on product features, ratings, and availability.

2. As a user, I want to view product details, images, descriptions, and reviews, so that I can make informed purchase decisions.
Acceptance Criteria:
 - The app should display detailed product information, including images, descriptions, specifications, and customer reviews.
 - The user should be able to zoom in on product images, read reviews, and compare similar products.

3. As a user, I want to add products to my shopping cart, so that I can save items for later purchase.
Acceptance Criteria:
 - The app should allow users to add products to their shopping cart with quantity selection.
 - The user should be able to view and edit the items in their shopping cart before checkout.

4. As a user, I want to create a user account, so that I can save my personal information, payment details, and order history.
Acceptance Criteria:
 - The app should provide a user registration feature with fields for personal information, email, password, and payment details.
 - The user should be able to log in, update their profile, and view their order history.

5. As a user, I want to receive order confirmation emails, shipping updates, and delivery notifications, so that I can track my purchases.
Acceptance Criteria:
 - The app should send order confirmation emails with details of the purchase, payment, and shipping address.
 - The user should receive shipping updates, tracking numbers, and delivery notifications for their orders.

6. As a user, I want to track my order status, so that I can monitor the progress of my purchases and estimated delivery dates.
Acceptance Criteria:
 - The app should provide an order tracking feature where users can check the status of their orders.
 - The user should be able to view order details, shipping updates, and estimated delivery dates.

7. As a user, I want to leave product reviews and ratings, so that I can share my feedback with other shoppers and help them make informed decisions.
Acceptance Criteria:
 - The app should allow users to leave reviews and ratings for products they have purchased.
 - The user should be able to rate products, write detailed reviews, and upload photos of their purchases.

8. As a user, I want to receive personalized product recommendations, discounts, and promotions, so that I can discover new items and save money.
Acceptance Criteria:
 - The app should provide personalized product recommendations based on user browsing history, purchase behavior, and preferences.
 - The user should receive discounts, promotions, and exclusive offers tailored to their interests and shopping habits.

9. As a user, I want to contact customer support, so that I can get assistance with product inquiries, order issues, and returns.
Acceptance Criteria:
 - The app should provide customer support contact options such as live chat, email, phone, or help center.
 - The user should be able to reach out to customer support for product inquiries, order tracking, and return requests.

10. As a user, I want to view my purchase history, so that I can track my spending, review past orders, and reorder items.
Acceptance Criteria:
 - The app should display a purchase history section where users can view past orders, order details, and order statuses.
 - The user should be able to reorder items, track spending, and review previous purchases.

11. As a user, I want to share product links and recommendations with friends and family, so that I can suggest items and gift ideas.
Acceptance Criteria:
 - The app should provide sharing options for product links, reviews, and recommendations on social media, messaging apps, or email.
 - The user should be able to share products, wishlists, and gift ideas with friends and family.

12. As a user, I want to save products to my wishlist, so that I can keep track of items I want to purchase in the future.
Acceptance Criteria:
 - The app should allow users to save products to a wishlist for future reference and easy access.
 - The user should be able to create multiple wishlists, add or remove items, and share wishlists with others.

13. As a user, I want to receive notifications for price drops, restocks, and new arrivals, so that I can stay updated on product availability and sales.
Acceptance Criteria:
 - The app should send notifications for price drops, restocks, and new arrivals for products saved in the user's wishlist.
 - The user should receive alerts for limited-time sales, promotions, and exclusive offers on wishlist items.

14. As a user, I want to participate in loyalty programs and earn rewards for purchases, so that I can save money and receive exclusive benefits.
Acceptance Criteria:
 - The app should offer a loyalty program where users can earn points, discounts, and rewards for purchases.
 - The user should be able to redeem points, access exclusive benefits, and participate in special promotions.

15. As a user, I want to customize my shopping preferences, so that I can receive personalized recommendations and offers.
Acceptance Criteria:
 - The app should allow users to customize their shopping preferences, such as favorite categories, brands, and price ranges.
 - The user should be able to update their preferences, receive tailored recommendations, and adjust notification settings.

16. As a user, I want to access a secure payment gateway, so that I can make purchases with confidence and protect my financial information.
Acceptance Criteria:
 - The app should provide a secure payment gateway for online transactions with encryption and fraud protection.
 - The user should be able to choose from multiple payment options, save payment methods, and securely complete purchases.

17. As a user, I want to view product availability and delivery options, so that I can choose the most convenient shipping method.
Acceptance Criteria:
 - The app should display product availability, delivery estimates, and shipping options for each item.
 - The user should be able to select delivery preferences, track shipments, and receive notifications for order updates.

18. As a user, I want to access a user-friendly interface and seamless navigation, so that I can easily browse products, place orders, and manage my account.
Acceptance Criteria:
 - The app should have a user-friendly interface with intuitive navigation, clear categories, and easy access to features.
 - The user should be able to browse products, search for items, place orders, and manage their account settings without difficulty.

19. As a user, I want to view size guides, product measurements, and fit recommendations, so that I can choose the right size and style for clothing and footwear.
Acceptance Criteria:
 - The app should provide size guides, product measurements, and fit recommendations for clothing, footwear, and accessories.
 - The user should be able to view size charts, fit tips, and customer reviews to make informed decisions about sizing and styling.

20. As a user, I want to access a seamless checkout process with order summary, payment options, and shipping details, so that I can complete purchases quickly and securely.
Acceptance Criteria:
 - The app should provide a seamless checkout process with an order summary, payment options, and shipping details on a single page.
 - The user should be able to review their order, select payment methods, enter shipping details, and complete purchases with ease.

21. As a user, I want to receive order confirmation emails, invoices, and receipts, so that I can keep track of my purchases and payments.
Acceptance Criteria:
 - The app should send order confirmation emails with order details, payment summaries, and shipping information.
 - The user should receive invoices, receipts, and order confirmations for their purchases via email or app notifications.

22. As a user, I want to provide feedback on product quality, customer service, and overall shopping experience, so that I can help the company improve and assist other shoppers.
Acceptance Criteria:
 - The app should allow users to provide feedback on product quality, customer service, and shopping experience through ratings, reviews, and surveys.
 - The user should be able to share feedback, suggestions, and complaints to help the company improve its products and services.

23. As a user, I want to access a help center, FAQs, and customer support options, so that I can get assistance with common issues and inquiries.
Acceptance Criteria:
 - The app should provide a help center with FAQs, tutorials, and customer support contact options.
 - The user should be able to access self-help resources, contact customer support, and find answers to common questions.

24. As a user, I want to view order history, track shipments, and manage returns, so that I can stay informed about my purchases and resolve any issues.
Acceptance Criteria:
 - The app should display order history, shipment tracking, and return options for users to manage their purchases.
 - The user should be able to view past orders, track shipments, initiate returns, and contact customer support for assistance.

25. As a user, I want to access a dark mode feature, so that I can reduce eye strain and improve readability during nighttime browsing.
Acceptance Criteria:
 - The app should provide a dark mode feature that changes the color scheme to dark backgrounds and light text.
 - The user should be able to enable or disable dark mode in the app settings for improved readability and reduced eye strain.

26. As a user, I want to receive notifications for flash sales, limited-time offers, and exclusive deals, so that I can take advantage of discounts and promotions.
Acceptance Criteria:
 - The app should send notifications for flash sales, limited-time offers, and exclusive deals on products of interest.
 - The user should receive alerts for time-sensitive promotions, discounts, and special offers to maximize savings.

27. As a user, I want to access a barcode scanner feature, so that I can scan product barcodes for quick access to product details and pricing.
Acceptance Criteria:
 - The app should provide a barcode scanner feature that uses the device's camera to scan product barcodes.
 - The user should be able to scan barcodes to view product details, pricing, availability, and customer reviews.

28. As a user, I want to view product recommendations based on my browsing history and preferences, so that I can discover new items and trends.
Acceptance Criteria:
 - The app should provide personalized product recommendations based on user browsing history, search queries, and preferences.
 - The user should see recommended products, similar items, and trending categories to explore new items and styles.

29. As a user, I want to access a voice search feature, so that I can search for products using voice commands and hands-free navigation.
Acceptance Criteria:
 - The app should provide a voice search feature that allows users to search for products using voice commands.
 - The user should be able to use voice search for product queries, category searches, and navigation within the app.

30. As a user, I want to access a live chat support option, so that I can get real-time assistance with product inquiries, order tracking, and technical issues.
Acceptance Criteria:
 - The app should provide a live chat support option for users to connect with customer support agents in real time.
 - The user should be able to chat with support representatives, ask questions, and get immediate assistance with product or order-related issues.

 Give me a use case diagram for this e-commerce app.

input:
Design a use case diagram for the following user stories for Webmed Healthcare System:

1. As a patient or caregiver, I want to register on the platform, so that I can access healthcare services.
2. As a user, I want to log in securely, so that I can access the system's features.
3. As a user, I want to explore different healthcare facilities and services, so that I can choose the appropriate service for my needs.
4. As a user, I want access to a finance module focused on purchasing insurance, so that I can ensure financial coverage for healthcare.
5. As a user, I want to access comprehensive information about diseases and symptoms under a Health A-Z feature, so that I can stay informed about health conditions.
6. As a user, I want access to resources like a symptom checker, health calculator, and a function to find doctors by location, so that I can manage my healthcare needs effectively.
7. As a user, I want access to an online medicine delivery option under the drugs and supplements section, so that I can conveniently get medications.
8. As a user, I want to make payments through a module for reimbursing providers, so that I can pay for healthcare services.
9. As a user, I want to provide feedback, so that the platform can improve the quality of services.
10. As a user, I want a logout feature, so that I can securely exit the platform.
11. As a user, I want access to a bulletin with news, health awareness, and information on experts and counseling programs, so that I can stay updated.
12. As a user, I want access to health insurance guides and ambulance services under the resources section, so that I can better manage my healthcare emergencies and insurance needs.
output:
@startuml
left to right direction

actor ServiceProvider
actor User

rectangle WebMedSystem {
    usecase "Register" as UC1
    usecase "Login" as UC2
    usecase "Use Facilities" as UC3
    usecase "Access Finance" as UC4
    usecase "Access Health A-Z" as UC5
    usecase "Use Resources" as UC6
    usecase "Do Payment" as UC7
    usecase "Give Feedback" as UC8
    usecase "Logout" as UC9
    usecase "Access News And Experts" as UC10
    usecase "Get Drugs And Supplements" as UC11
}

ServiceProvider --> UC6
User --> UC1
User --> UC2
User --> UC3
User --> UC9
User --> UC7
User --> UC6
User --> UC10
User --> UC11
User --> UC5
User --> UC4

UC7 ..> UC8 : <<extend>>
@enduml

2. As a teacher, I want to conduct online quizzes and tests, so that I can assess student understanding.
3. As a student, I want to participate in virtual classroom discussions, so that I can engage with the class.
4. As a student, I want to submit assignments online, so that I can complete course requirements.
5. As an administrator, I want to manage user accounts, so that I can ensure smooth operation of the system.
6. As an administrator, I want to monitor classroom activities, so that I can track student progress and participation.
output:
@startuml
left to right direction

actor Teacher
actor Student
actor Administrator

rectangle SmartClassroomSystem {
    usecase "Share Educational Materials" as UC1
    usecase "Conduct Quizzes and Tests" as UC2
    usecase "Participate in Discussions" as UC3
    usecase "Submit Assignments" as UC4
    usecase "Manage User Accounts" as UC5
    usecase "Monitor Classroom Activities" as UC6
}

Teacher --> UC1
Teacher --> UC2
Student --> UC3
Student --> UC4
Administrator --> UC5
Administrator --> UC6
@enduml

input: Design me a use case diagram for this system. As a student, faculty, or contributor, I want to manage articles by writing, editing, and publishing them, so I can contribute to the college magazine. As a user, I want to rate published articles, so I can provide feedback on the content I read. As a user, I want to comment on published articles, so I can share my thoughts and opinions with others. As a user, I want to organize articles into appropriate categories, so I can easily navigate and find content based on topics of interest. As a guest, I want to read, rate, and comment on articles, so I can engage with the magazine's content without being a registered user. As a guest, I want to contribute content for the magazine if interested, so I can participate in the magazine without being a full member. As a moderator, I want to review articles before they are published, so I can ensure content quality and appropriateness.
output:
@startuml
left to right direction

actor User
actor Guest
actor Moderator

User <|-- Student
User <|-- Faculty
User <|-- Contributor

rectangle Online_College_Magazine_System {
    usecase "Manage Articles" as UC1
    usecase "Rate Articles" as UC2
    usecase "Comment on Articles" as UC3
    usecase "Organize Articles" as UC4
    usecase "Generate Content" as UC5
    usecase "Review Articles" as UC6
}

User --> UC1
User --> UC2
User --> UC3
User --> UC4

Guest --> UC2
Guest --> UC3
Guest --> UC5

Moderator --> UC6
@enduml
